channel.title: Muhammad Usman Farooq
channel.description: Recent content on Muhammad Usman Farooq

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I am Usman and I am a Computing Mathematics major at the City University of Hong Kong. While I tinker with different spaces like Tools for Thoughts, my current research interests span quantum information theory and complexity theory, quantum algorithms and optimization, and programming languages. On the side I like to read, take long walks, and get caffeinated. Currently, I am working with Prof. Penghui Yao @ Nanjing University as a Research Assistant on a research project at the intersection of Quantum Information Theory and Quantum Communication Complexity.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello, Aah so here we are. I think I have finally mustered the courage to start a blog. I had myraid of reasons to start a blog, and I have been planning to blog for the past few years, but I guess procrastination always managed to kick in. Voila! Here we are. While I have taken the first step and commenced this journey, the real obstacle is maintaining consistency. I remember talking to a friend about the difficulties of starting something and investing consistent efforts.
